author: Debra Dudek
text: Made a super great dinner of marinated pork chops and Brussel sprouts.  My friends brought stuffing, potatoes, and cauliflower.  Fruit tart for dessert.  An excellent meal for Beltane, May Day, and everything else relating to the lovely month of May.

author: Debra Dudek
text: I just discovered #bardcore and I’m just shocked that I haven’t had this in my life sooner! https://t.co/AU9yc6pkXe

author: Debra Dudek
text: Another season cliffhanger #Sanditon? https://t.co/PnLutjyvfb

author: Debra Dudek
text: I just bought the only two #babyyoda sleeping bags for my nephews at #ALDI, and I’m pretty sure all the other little kids will be crying themselves to sleep tonight under their regular blankets. #bestauntieever https://t.co/6uMAXcsAQU

author: Debra Dudek
text: This is a #LOTR hot take, but if Gandalf had just let Bilbo take the one ring to Rivendell, it would have saved the other hobbits a load of trouble. #JustSaying https://t.co/CrYgXdO8At

author: Debra Dudek
text: I’m not bragging or anything, but I just served thinly sliced marinated beef loin for dinner with my friends tonight.  It was brilliant. https://t.co/in0n6JkjKo

author: Debra Dudek
text: #Genealogy friends, I am presenting a lecture on Illinois and Michigan Canal records this month.  Would really love to have you in the audience on April 29! https://t.co/tmo9Bptqrn

author: Debra Dudek
text: For my #birthday, I’m watching the original Young Indiana Jones Chronicles.  It’s a lot like Forrest Gump, and absolutely everyone who is anyone is in this show - Emperor Palpatine, Agent Coulson, Saruman.  The documentaries for this show are outstanding as well! https://t.co/GkyTxFEh6n

author: Debra Dudek
text: I have never been to Waffle House.  Is it worth the hype?

author: Debra Dudek
text: I drove past a #Rax restaurant and it was OPEN.  How is this possible?  I thought they were all closed.  My mind is blown. https://t.co/6k0eayxMvN

author: Debra Dudek
text: Thank you @pega and the @DropkickMurphys for the awesome #stpatricksday2022 streaming concert! You all are amazing! Cheers! https://t.co/LkB3gb0VLh

author: Debra Dudek
text: I’m three episodes into #Sanditon and I’m wondering why I’ve waited so long to watch it. https://t.co/xulSFEkS04

author: Debra Dudek
text: I love the new @MasterClass course with @KosherSoul.  I loved the Cooking Gene, and I love this class.  There have been tears and laughs and deep soul searching.

author: Debra Dudek
text: Have an appointment to have the air vents and dryer vent cleaned out today.  Put the dog and cat in the bathroom for their safety and for those of the workmen.  They’ve busted out once, and their panicked cries and clawing are awful.  #auntguilt #gottagetitdone

author: Debra Dudek
text: Cat and dog sitting for my sister for two weeks.  They follow me everywhere.  They watch me shower.  They gaze longingly at my dinner plate.  I am never alone.  #heldhostagebypets https://t.co/T1NElFoHws

author: Debra Dudek
text: There are simply not enough episodes of Stanley Tucci’s series “Searching For Italy.”  I want all the cheese, all the meat, all the bread, all the wine, all the rice, and all the pasta.  I need to go to Bologna.

author: Debra Dudek
text: I’m not saying I needed a set of Baby Yoda tiki shot glasses, but they are so gosh darn cute I couldn’t say no. #BabyYoda #StarWars #Grogu #Mandalorian https://t.co/uz56umGuDK

author: Debra Dudek
text: I’m really enjoying Snowboard Cross at the #OlympicGames.  Racing with snowboards.  What’s not to like?

author: Debra Dudek
text: I’m on the fence about seeing #SecretsOfDumbledore.  The last film could have been amazing, but I walked out really disappointed.  Who’s planning to go?

author: Debra Dudek
text:
What baffles me about #OlympicGames interviews are the questions posed to athletes after they fall/drop something/blunder.
Q: “So, looks like you had some difficulties out there today!”
Athlete: *internal eye roll and a silent ‘eff this guy’*
Stop asking these questions, yo.

author: Debra Dudek
text: My primary complaint about the #TalkinOlympics (and all the other Olympic Games) is the non-stop talking.  @NBCOlympics, just point the cameras on the event, and let us watch.  PLEASE STOP TALKING.

author: Debra Dudek
text: So many feels from Episode 6 of #TheBookOfBobaFett.  So. Many. Feels!  So awesome!  Have to watch it again!

author: Debra Dudek
text: Watching episode five of #BookofBobaFett and I am SO PUMPED to see #TheMandalorian!  Best episode so far!

author: Debra Dudek
text: Wishing all my friends a delightful #BurnsNight  🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿😘 https://t.co/Z4ooCoOYee

author: Debra Dudek
text: My friend is staying for two weeks, and we’re drinking on a school night.  We are rebels.

author: Debra Dudek
text: Decorating for a Burns Supper?  Oh, why yes.  I have a few things up.  Nothing over the top or anything. 🙃

author: Debra Dudek
text: I know it’s not the weekend yet, but two glasses of wine and a dram took up my time tonight.

author: Debra Dudek
text: Used dish soap and laundry detergent to wash a floor rug today.  Felt like a rebel when I put everything into the washer.  Turned out beautifully!

author: Debra Dudek
text: Watched @How2Drink’s episode on champagne cocktails and drank a bottle worth of 1855-ish versions and have zero regrets.  Yes, once you have one you’ll want another! #NewYear2022 #howtodrink

author: Debra Dudek
text: Raising a glass to all my Twitter friends!  https://t.co/Ro8exu1t7J

author: Debra Dudek
text: Happy Hogmanay to my family and friends in Scotland, Canada, and the US! https://t.co/HlWHZuN4Pi

author: Debra Dudek
text: Took @doomcock’s recommendation and watched #SpiderManNoWayHome.  First time in two years I’ve been inside a movie theatre.  BEST #Marvel MOVIE EVER!  Best movie I’ve seen all year!  Go watch it! https://t.co/CbtUhyz0JM

author: Debra Dudek
text: Watching a steaming version of Trading Places and I never realised how many boobs and swear words are in this film.  🙃 https://t.co/Sntbihw5ro

author: Debra Dudek
text: Just finished re-reading “A Christmas Carol” and it is marvellous! https://t.co/H3QfzfLrtX

author: Debra Dudek
text:
*Listening to “Last Christmas” on the car radio with Mom*
Mom: “Poor old Wham!  He’s dead!”
Me: “Huh?” 😂😂

author: Debra Dudek
text: Since @BernthalMary has been so sweet to share her #costco #Wine #AdventCalendar adventure with me, I’m sending the first five pairs of socks in my #Mandalorian #BabyYoda sock #AdventCalendar.  I can only wear one sock at a time due to my foot surgery. Carry on Mary! https://t.co/uyQGc2PcNQ

author: Debra Dudek
text: Watching #TheWitcher2 and it is hands down great.  The writers dropped the disjointed storytelling which nearly doomed the first season.  I’ll have to ration the last four episodes because it is SO GOOD!

author: Debra Dudek
text: Oh @BernthalMary, I drank the #Costco #Wine #AdventCalendar merlot today while enjoying homemade Indian food.  It was tip top!

author: Debra Dudek
text: Watching ‘Meet Me In St. Louis.’  I love this film. My grandfather’s aunts would have been making friends, going to parties, and falling in love during the same time period.  I would loved to be there with them. #genealogy #thoughts https://t.co/ZroRNHoro8

author: Debra Dudek
text: #Costco #Wine #AdventCalendar Day 4: Volde Cabernet Sauvignon: Jammy and fruit forward with Current notes.  Overall, a winner!  Tag, you’re it @BernthalMary and @CostcoWine! https://t.co/s3mm78U5HH

author: Debra Dudek
text: #Costco #Wine #AdventCalendar Day 2: Portrait of a Wallflower Merlot.  A dryer red wine with flavour notes of tobacco and oak.  Not a fan, but I’m glass in so I might as well polish it off.  How about you @BernthalMary and @CostcoWine? https://t.co/pcoQTWeASO

author: Debra Dudek
text: Been incorporating more genealogy items into my holiday decorations.  Found a photos of my grandparents farmhouse and Christmas tree.  I like how these turned out. https://t.co/rvma8B9urb

author: Debra Dudek
text: For you American football fans - the 1934 Thanksgiving match between the Detroit Lions and Chicago Bears was the first NFL game to be broadcast.  #Thanksgiving #football  #CHIvsDET

author: Debra Dudek
text: Thank you @USATODAY for the awesome livestream of the @Macys Thanksgiving Day Parade.  Loved watching the live broadcast on @YouTube and feeling like I had the best seat at the parade!

author: Debra Dudek
text: Having sushi and French Martinis for dinner. *burp* https://t.co/qSitK8qHwL

author: Debra Dudek
text: I’m going to @BinnysBev after work today.  You all need anything? #nightbefore #Thanksgiving

author: Debra Dudek
text: Deciding between two holiday wreath designs.  Which one? https://t.co/fDyvq2yqUw

author: Debra Dudek
text: If anyone ever wondered how many taper candles it takes to provide excellent light for washing up, the answer is four.  Pro tip - You will need a candelabra.  Anyway, the new kitchen ceiling light fixture will arrive later this week. #home #renovation https://t.co/UATO91twZB

author: Debra Dudek
text: In honor of Armistice Day and Remembrance Day, I have recorded a special session of " The Diary of Wesley Peever – A World War I Genealogical Mystery" and have made it available to view for free for the next seven days - https://t.co/rKO1kGFhjY #WeWillRememberThem #genealogy https://t.co/sCpkD0ugVT
